intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: Greetings, Prince Chrom. Plegia welcomes you.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Aversa!

intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: What can I say? It seems fate has designs for me yet.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: You serve the new king, then? This... Validar?

intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: I do.

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: They say he worships Grima...

intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: Why yes, of course he is Grimleal. We are both believers. My liege often says it was his faith that got him through, after Gangrel's passing. It was a difficult time... But he kept order where there might have been chaos. We had meant to arrange an official visit to Ylisstol, but—Ah, here is my lord now.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: An honor to finally meet you, sire. I am Validar, king regnant of Plegia.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: The honor is mine, good king. ...Is it possible we've met before some... Gods! It can't be.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Oh ho, I'm quite certain I would remember any encounter with Ylissean royalty.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: And you must be Sir/Lady Robin.

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: You know of me, sire?

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: The whole world knows of Ylisse's master tactician! And indeed, I see the sparkle of wisdom in your eyes.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: My, the negotiations haven't even begun and already so much whispering...

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: ...My apologies, King Validar. We meant no disrespect.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Then let us get to it.

intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: Plegia can offer no soldiers, but will provide 800 warships and 200 transports. In addition, we would be pleased to fully fund the campaign against Valm.

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: That is... surprisingly generous of you, milord. We could not ask for more, quite literally. You offer most all your assets...

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: I would give troops as well, but our army remains in shambles from the last war. I trust the gold and ships will suffice as a sign of our commitment to the cause?

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Of course it will. Thank you, King Validar.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: The honor is ours, my prince. I look forward to building a strong bond between our two nations.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: As do I. Then, if there's nothing else? My men and I must hurry back to Port Ferox.

intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: Oh, so soon? But I have one more introduction to make.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: ...Yes? And who would that be?

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: A hierophant, the highest of his/her order in Plegia.

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: ...So you lead the people in worship? We were just discussing religion earlier...

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: ...I'm sorry, have I said something to offend you?
...The heart still sleeps, but the blood flows through it. And the blood is strong...

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: ...Huh? Beg pardon, were you talking to me?

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: Good hierophant, I would ask you to lower your cowl. In Ylisse, it is a courtesy expected of one in the presence of royalty.
...... ...You are a long way from Ylisse, sir. ...But very well...
Is that better?

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: What?!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: By the gods!

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: What matter of sorcery--

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: He/She looks just like... me.
My name is Robin. Oh, and that was YOUR name as well, wasn't it? What a strange coincidence...

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Why that IS rather curious, now that you mention it... What are the odds? In any case, I believe we are finished here. We will let you be on your w--

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Hold just one moment!

intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: Milord?

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: What is the meaning of this? Why do your hierophant and Robin--

intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: I'm afraid we've no time for such trivial matters now, Your Highness. We have aid preparations to attend to, and you have a long, hard journey ahead. Oh, and do be careful on your way back to Port Ferox. This time of year the highroads of Plegia can be quite treacherous...

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: ...... It's no use. I can't sleep. Who was that man/woman? How could he/she bear my same face?
Robin... Heed me, Robin...

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: Huh? Who's there?! T-there's no one. I'm alone...
Heed my call, Robin...

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: Nngh... This voice is... in my head? Who are you?! What's happening?!

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Why do you close your heart to him, Robin?

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: V-Validar?

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Have you truly forgotten?

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: You were... calling me... Augh! My head! Get out of my mind.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Heh heh. Such arrogance! You dare take such a tone... with your own father?!

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: ...My what?

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: You are of my flesh, but of sacred blood. You are to serve a glorious purpose! Search deep in your heart. You already know it is your destiny...

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: No... Get... out...

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Why do you resist us, Robin? Your rightful place is at my side. Not wasting your time with these doomed servants of Naga! Give yourself to Grima! Let me join your strength to the fell dragon!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Robin!

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: ...Pah! Not this one again... No matter. In time you will see the truth. And that is all it will be—a matter of time...

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Robin! Are you all right? I heard shouting.

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: Nngh... Ahh... Ahh... I-I think so... Yes, Chrom, thank you. I'm... I'm fine.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: "Fine" is a poor choice of words! What's happened?!

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: ...King Validar, he... He spoke to me... in my mind. He said I was his... his son/daughter.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: What?! ...Is this true?

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: I don't know... But I also don't know it's a lie. Loath as I am to say it, I felt a... a strange connection, between us.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Oh, gods... That hierophant doppelganger... Could he/she be the king's son/daughter, as well? Are you twins?

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: I... I'm sorry, Chrom. I can't remember... But if I'm being honest... it would explain much... I'm not even sure I want to know the truth of my past anymore.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: You are yourself, before you are any man's son/daughter. Remember that.

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: ...Thank you, Chrom.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Can you walk?

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: Yes... yes, I think so.

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: Milord, we are under attack! Risen have encircled the camp!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: But... we posted sentries! How did this happen?

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: They made a stealthy approach, milord. I've never seen Risen behave like this. Either they are learning our ways, or someone is commanding them...

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Validar! This is his doing—I'm sure of it. Equip anyone who can bear arms, and tell them we fight for our lives!
